| Property | Attribute | Description | Type      | Default     |

| `height` | `height`  |             | `number`  | `undefined` |
| `nozoom` | `nozoom`  |             | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `poster` | `poster`  |             | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `width`  | `width`   |             | `number`  | `undefined` |
